helps.text:
Converted to standard Envy 1.x by Jason Huang (god@sure.net)
Further conversion to Rom 2.4 by Jaceks and Chicken's Den Staff

mobiles.name: lich guardian
mobiles.long_description: The Guardian Lich steps out of the shadows and attacks!
mobiles.description:
The Guardian lich looks like a decaying corpse, with small glowing points of
light for eyes.

mobiles.name: vampire assistant
mobiles.long_description: A lab assistant turns toward you and bares his fangs!
mobiles.description:
This lab assistant was chosen from amongst the undead for both his knowledge
of magic, and his rather nasty disposition.  He revels in creating loathesome,
twisted, warped creatures to serve Ciquala.

mobiles.name: creature nightmare
mobiles.short_description: a warped creature from a nightmare
mobiles.long_description: A warped creature as if from a nightmare is here.
mobiles.description:
This creature may resemble some kind of serpent, but some parts of it are
covered with scales, and others with hair.  It's head has 1 large bulbous eye,
much like that of an insect.  Long talons reach out for you to shred you alive.

mobiles.name: creature docile
mobiles.long_description: A docile creature stands here, probably from an experiment that failed.
mobiles.description:
The creature would probably not hurt a fly.  Actually, it is unaware of its own
existence.

mobiles.name: black pudding crate
mobiles.description:
As you examine this crate, a black tarlike substance seeps between the boards
slowly eating the wood away.  It is a black pudding!

mobiles.name: gigantic automaton
mobiles.long_description: A gigantic automaton blocks your way.
mobiles.description:
This gigantic construct is made of a metallic substance that you do not
recognize.  He stands about 8' tall, brushing the ceiling.

mobiles.name: undead guardian
mobiles.long_description: An undead guardian screams at you and attacks!
mobiles.description:
This creature is a hovering dark shape.  It does not seem to have a body so
to speak.  As it approaches you, a harsh chill makes you shiver.

mobiles.name: roof ceiling lurker above
mobiles.description:
The ceiling appears rather shiny.  Not like dirt at all.  You suddenly realize
that it isn't a ceiling, but a LURKER ABOVE!  You had better attack before
it drops on you!

mobiles.name: vampire servant
mobiles.long_description: A vampire servant to Ciquala is here, hungering for your blood.
mobiles.description:
This vampire looks very pale and thin.  Ciquala has not been allowing him
enough time at night to feed properly.  He is VERY happy that you walked in
on him.

mobiles.name: human automaton
mobiles.long_description: A mindless automaton that used to be human is standing here.
mobiles.description:
This mindless lump of flesh used to be human.  It's flesh has been converted
to a dull grey substance.  The automaton is very strong, and will be a fierce
opponent.

mobiles.name: human automaton
mobiles.long_description: A mindless automaton that used to be human is standing here.
mobiles.description:
This mindless lump of flesh used to be human.  It's flesh has been converted
to a dull grey substance.  The automaton is very strong, and will be a fierce
opponent.

mobiles.name: human automaton
mobiles.long_description: A mindless automaton that used to be human is standing here.
mobiles.description:
This mindless lump of flesh used to be human.  It's flesh has been converted
to a dull grey substance.  The automaton is very strong, and will be a fierce
opponent.

mobiles.name: human automaton
mobiles.long_description: A mindless automaton that used to be human is standing here.
mobiles.description:
This mindless lump of flesh used to be human.  It's flesh has been converted
to a dull grey substance.  The automaton is very strong, and will be a fierce
opponent.

mobiles.name: torturer lich
mobiles.long_description: A blackened creature stands here, ready to cause you excruciating pain.
mobiles.description: You'd better not look to close, he may charm you.

mobiles.name: undead dragon
mobiles.long_description: Ciquala's undead pet dragon is here, snacking on a fresh corpse.
mobiles.description: This skeletal dragon is an ancient red dragon preserved through arcane magic.

mobiles.name: Ciquala lich
mobiles.long_description:
A powerful, evil looking lich stands here, Ciquala, 
the oldest of all the undead.
mobiles.description:
Ciquala still looks majestic after all these thousands of years.  But you can
see the menace in her eye as she looks at you, and prepares her first spell.

mobiles.name: lich
mobiles.long_description: The Lich wonders what you are doing in its crypt.
mobiles.description:
The Lich looks like a decaying corpse, with small glowing points of
light for eyes.

mobiles.name: vampire
mobiles.long_description:
The vampire is very hungry.  
With you here, he won't even have to go out hunting for fresh blood tonight.
mobiles.description:
The vampire looks incredibly strong.  He is wearing musty clothes, and has
large fangs that seem to grow longer as he looks back at you.

mobiles.name: vampire assistant
mobiles.long_description: A lab assistant turns toward you and bares her fangs!
mobiles.description:
This lab assistant was chosen from amongst the undead for both his knowledge
of magic, and his rather nasty disposition.  She revels in creating loathesome,
twisted, warped creatures to serve Ciquala.

objects.name: ciquala's sword
objects.description: A large, black sword lies here.

objects.name: ciquala's robe
objects.description: A heavy pile of black cloth lies in the dust.

objects.name: Ciquala's staff
objects.description: A black staff lies on the ground.

objects.name: crate
objects.description: A crate stands here.

objects.name: key
objects.description: A key lies on the ground.

objects.name: key
objects.description: A iron key lies on the ground.

objects.name: key large
objects.description: A large key lies on the ground.

objects.name: blue potion
objects.description: A blue bottle of liquid lies here.

objects.name: emerald vial
objects.description: An emerald vial lies here

objects.name: testube clear
objects.description: A clear testube contains an unknown liquid.

objects.name: vial green
objects.description: A green vial sits on  a shelf.

objects.name: gold liquid vial
objects.description: A vial with a gold colored liquid sits on the floor.

objects.name: milky liquid vial
objects.description: A vial with milky liquid sits on the shelf.

objects.name: black potion
objects.description: A black potion is waiting to be picked up.

objects.name: beaker yellow
objects.description: A beaker filled with yellow bubbling liquid sits on the counter.

objects.name: iron maiden
objects.description: An iron maiden sits here, looking rather unused.  Why not try it on?

objects.name: torturer's whip
objects.description: An enormous whip lies here.

objects.name: treasure coins gold
objects.description: A humongous pile of gold is waiting to be picked up.

objects.name: gems pile
objects.description: A pile of gems lies on the ground.

objects.name: crate
objects.description: A crate stands here.

objects.name: crate
objects.description: A crate stands here.

objects.name: crate
objects.description: A crate stands here.

objects.name: crate
objects.description: A crate stands here.

objects.name: fizzing bottle
objects.description: A bottle of fizzing liquid lies here.

objects.name: grey potion
objects.description: A grey potion sits on the counter.

rooms.name: A large knothole in a tree
rooms.description:
You stand in a cramped space inside an old, gnarled tree.  A frigid
breeze rises from the ground.
     There is a small (Glowing) (Humming) tablet.

extra_descriptions.description:
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
+                                                                  +
+            This area has been converted and adapted by           +
+                             Kajko                                +
+                                                                  +
+                               &                                  +
+                                                                  +
+                      revised, debugged (?:)                      +
+               slightly enchanced and balanced by                 +
+    jaceks and after him by asena            , september 1996     +
+                                                                  +
+    PS. prepare to die - it is {40 62} area with aggro mobs       +
+                   only armed personel allowed                    +
+                                                                  +
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

rooms.name: A ladder descending into the darkness!
rooms.description:
You are climbing on a ladder.  Above you is a trapdoor.  Below you
is only darkness, from which a frigid breeze blows.

rooms.name: A ladder descending into the darkness!
rooms.description:
You are climbing on a ladder.  Above you the ladder disappears in the
dark.  Below is only darkness, from which a frigid breeze blows.

rooms.name: A dusty tunnel deep under the ground
rooms.description:
You stand in a tunnel that appears to have been dug out of the dirt.
You do not understand what is keeping the tunnel walls from caving in.  This
would probably be a very bad place to use a dispel magic spell!  You do see
some footprints in the dust, and looking up, you see who they belong to!

rooms.name: A room with a large pool of water in the center
rooms.description:
This room has a large pool of black water in the center.  You see
many runes and glyphs surrounding it.  The room is lit by torches held in
sconces.  Each of these items in the room merits more investigation.

extra_descriptions.description:
These runes are carved into the rock about the pool.  You think you
recognize the rune of vision, and another that has something to do with
projecting power at a distance.

The glyphs are drawn upon the stone with what appears to be blood.
You do not recognize any of them, and it would probably be a good idea not to
touch any of them.

The sconces are black and shaped liked two hands, cradling the torches
between their pointed nails.

The torches are made of a black wood, and as you draw nearer, you find
that they do not emit any heat.  Indeed, they seem to be radiating cold.  The
flames are an icy blue, that makes you think twice about getting too close to
them.

As you lean forward and look in the pool, you see nothing but the dark
murky water.  Gradually though, an image forms before you.  You recognize the
person the image shows.  It is the Avatar!  Apparently this is a pool that
Ciquala uses to scry upon her enemies. The image is so clear, you almost
believe you could step into the pool, and appear in Lord British's castle.

rooms.name: Ciquala's Laboratory
rooms.description:
This room is lined with shelves that contain a multitude of jars,
boxes, vials, chests, tubes, glasses, beakers, and other assorted containers.
You think that drinking the contents of any might have undesireable effects.

rooms.name: Supply room
rooms.description:
This supply room keeps many of the items that are too large to fit in
the laboratory itself.  You see several corpses that are preserved by the
ever-present cold that you have encountered in every room in this tunnel
system.  Also several crates hold contents, whose scent is enought to make
you wish to shut the door immediately.  You believe that you hear a noise
from behind one of the crates.

rooms.name: Holding Cell
rooms.description:
This is nothing more than a small room with a very heavy iron door
closing it off from the laboratory.  This is where Ciquala's assistants keep
the experiments they are working on.

rooms.name: Holding Cell
rooms.description:
This is nothing more than a small room with a very heavy iron door
closing it off from the laboratory.  This is where Ciquala's minions keep
the experiments they are working on.

rooms.name: Guard room
rooms.description:
The occupants of this room were obviously left here by the Lich to
keep intruders like you from bothering her, or learning her plans.  There
are doors to both the east and west.

rooms.name: A seemingly empty tunnel
rooms.description:
This empty tunnel has doors leading in all directions.  The roof of
the tunnel seems abnormally low and shiny, almost as if it is not dirt.  This
room is also as cold as all the others were.

rooms.name: The Map Room
rooms.description:
This room is filled with maps, apparently containing some of Ciquala's
plans.  You notice many maps of Lord British's castle.  You might be able to
gain some information on Ciquala's plans, as well as learn your way through
British's castle if you examine the map more closely.

extra_descriptions.description:
As you reach for a map to examine it closer, it bursts into ice cold flames and
disintegrates before your eyes.  Apparently Ciquala has taken precautions
against people snooping in her Lair.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description:
You see many boxes before you, apparently this is a storage room of
some sort.  You can bet that whatever a lich is storing, that it can't be good
for the world in general.

rooms.name: A tunnel with a grate in the floor
rooms.description:
You see a grate on the floor.  When you look down it, you see several
creatures below, humanoid, but you can't make out exactly what they are.
There are also doors leading all directions but west.

rooms.name: The Room of the Automatons
rooms.description:
You gasp as you realize that these pasty faced people do not seem to
have a will of their own.  No doubt the work of the Lich.  If these
monstrosities are allowed to escape into the world, they will cause no end
of problems for Midgaard.

rooms.name: Torture Chamber
rooms.description:
This room is fitted with many instruments and tools designed to cause
pain and fear in anyone who enters.  However, you don't pay as much attention
to the racks and iron maidens as you would if were not for the lich in the
room.

rooms.name: Entrance to Ciquala's Throne Room
rooms.description:
This does not look like any of the other rooms you have been in up till
now.  The ceiling rises a full 40 feet in the air above you.  The walls are
covered with murals proclaiming the might and majesty of Ciquala.  She does
not look old and decayed as you would have pictured her.  Instead, she looks
rather regal and stately, but undoubtedly evil.

rooms.name: Ciquala's Throne Room
rooms.description:
This room is clothed in darkness, and a chill eminates from the foul
monarch of the undead.  A large tapestry hangs behind her throne.  The
ceiling rises above you, hidden in the darkness beyond the range your
light can penetrate.  A feeling of hopelessness and insignificance overwhelms
you as you face the Lich, Ciquala!

rooms.name: Treasure Chamber of Ciquala
rooms.description:
This room contains enough wealth to fund an army, perhaps a small
kingdom.  Racks or weapons, and spellbooks, and potions, not to mention large
piles of coins that cover the floor.  A large paving stone in this room seems
slightly disturbed.

exits.description: The stone appears to hide a secret passage going down.

extra_descriptions.description: The paving stone seems to be masking a passage down into a pit below this room.

rooms.name: The hidden crypt of Ciquala
rooms.description:
This room contains several crypts where the lichs and vampires rest.
Unfortunately, they all seem to be out of their crypts right now.
